channel.title: IPv6 on Xavier Garcia
channel.description: Recent content in IPv6 on Xavier Garcia

item.title: Activate IPv6 on Ubiquity Edge router lite
item.description: Summary Below are the commands and my thoughts on setting up IPv6 on a Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Lite (ERLite-3). Were one to follow this as a guide, the results should be functioning IPv6 on the WAN and LAN side. Note: As of EdgeMax v1.9.0, most IPv6 functionality is not available via the GUI. But, there is a new wizard as of this release which may work for the most basic case.
